Earth plunging is A-ok.

::Firearm/Prowl::

Firearm tries to spin out of the way of the blast, but it takes off 
his other leg and some of his lower body. The top half of Firearm 
fights to remain conscious, flying toward the CF as fast as he could.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing the ground rapidly approaching, Prowl releases Menasor's neck 
with his front legs. Instead, he grabs Iron Raptor, making sure that 
he had a secure grip on her with his front legs (if this isn't ok 
with you, Megan, then its void), he grabbed her with his back legs as 
well, lifting off Menasor and using his large wings to fly away from 
the bot.

(Rdahl, can you wait for Megan to post if my actions were ok or not 
before posting with Menasor?)



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry
> 
> Menasor notices his target getting up and leaving, he stops his 
climb into
> the air, and halts for a moment, 600 feet high in the air. He aims 
his huge
> Cyclone gun at Firearm. The huge barrel of the blaster locks onto 
the
> target, and fires a huge torent of energy. Then after his shot, 
Menasor
> plunges downwards, at a huge speed, heading straight for the 
ground. I he
> cant rid himself of his opponents, he will crash them.
